description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由蒙古族建立的统一王朝，由元世祖忽必烈于1271年建立，定都大都（今北京）。1368年被明朝推翻，元廷退居漠北，史称北元。
description.en: A unified dynasty in Chinese history established by the Mongols, founded by Kublai Khan in 1271 with its capital at Dadu (present-day Beijing). It was overthrown by the Ming dynasty in 1368, after which the Yuan court retreated to the northern steppes, historically known as the Northern Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国第五代大汗及元朝的开国皇帝。他是拖雷的第四子，成吉思汗的孙子。他在1271年改国号为“大元”，并于1279年灭南宋，统一中国。
description.en: The fifth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire and the founding emperor of the Yuan dynasty. He was the fourth son of Tolui and a grandson of Genghis Khan. He changed the state title to 'Great Yuan' in 1271 and conquered the Southern Song in 1279, unifying China.

description.zh-cn: 由成吉思汗于1206年在漠北建立的帝国，是元朝的前身。其后分裂为元朝和四大汗国。
description.en: An empire founded by Genghis Khan in 1206 in the northern steppes, and the predecessor of the Yuan dynasty. It later fragmented into the Yuan dynasty and the Four Khanates.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国的创始人和第一位大汗，统一了蒙古各部。后被元朝追尊为元太祖。
description.en: The founder and first Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, who united the Mongol tribes. He was posthumously honored as Emperor Taizu of Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 元初的政治家和学者，深受忽必烈信任，建议忽必烈取《易经》“大哉乾元”之意定国号为“大元”，并负责规划元大都的建设。
description.en: A statesman and scholar in the early Yuan dynasty, deeply trusted by Kublai Khan. He suggested that Kublai adopt the name 'Great Yuan' from the I Ching and was responsible for planning the construction of the capital, Dadu.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈于1271年12月18日颁布的诏书，正式建立国号为“大元”。
description.en: The edict issued by Kublai Khan on December 18, 1271, officially establishing the state title 'Great Yuan'.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上宋朝的后半段，与金朝、西夏、蒙古等政权并立，最终于1279年被元朝所灭。
description.en: The latter period of the Song dynasty in Chinese history, coexisting with regimes such as the Jin dynasty, Western Xia, and the Mongols. It was ultimately conquered by the Yuan dynasty in 1279.

description.zh-cn: 宋元战争的最后一场战役，元军在此战中彻底消灭了南宋的抵抗力量，标志着南宋的灭亡。
description.en: The final battle of the Song-Yuan wars, where the Yuan forces completely annihilated the resistance of the Southern Song, marking the end of the Southern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由朱元璋建立的中国王朝，于1368年推翻元朝的统治。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Zhu Yuanzhang, which overthrew the rule of the Yuan dynasty in 1368.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国军事统帅，于1368年率军北伐，攻陷元大都，结束了元朝在全国的统治。
description.en: The founding military commander of the Ming dynasty who led the northern expedition in 1368, capturing the Yuan capital Dadu and ending Yuan rule over China.

description.zh-cn: 元朝被明朝推翻后，元顺帝率领的元朝残余势力退居漠北建立的政权。
description.en: The regime established by the remnants of the Yuan dynasty, led by Emperor Shun of Yuan, who retreated to the northern steppes after being overthrown by the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古大汗蒙哥去世后，其弟忽必烈与阿里不哥为争夺汗位而爆发的战争，导致蒙古帝国走向分裂。
description.en: The war between Kublai and Ariq Böke for the succession of the Great Khan after the death of Möngke Khan, which led to the division of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷的第七子，在拖雷家族内战中与忽必烈争夺汗位，最终失败。
description.en: The seventh son of Tolui, who contended with Kublai Khan for the throne in the Toluid Civil War and was ultimately defeated.

description.zh-cn: 元朝末年爆发的大规模农民起义，最终推翻了元朝的统治。
description.en: A large-scale peasant rebellion that broke out in the late Yuan dynasty, ultimately leading to its overthrow.

description.zh-cn: 元末红巾军起义领袖之一，后建立明朝，成为明朝开国皇帝。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Red Turban Rebellion in the late Yuan dynasty, who later founded the Ming dynasty and became its first emperor.

description.zh-cn: 由女真族建立的中国北方王朝，与南宋对峙，后于1234年被蒙古帝国所灭。
description.en: A dynasty in northern China established by the Jurchens, which confronted the Southern Song dynasty and was later conquered by the Mongol Empire in 1234.

description.zh-cn: 由党项族建立的中国西北部王国，于1227年被蒙古帝国所灭。
description.en: A kingdom in northwestern China established by the Tanguts, which was conquered by the Mongol Empire in 1227.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国时期的政治家，契丹族。他劝谏窝阔台汗在汉地推行汉法，保护农业生产，对蒙古帝国的统治政策产生重要影响。
description.en: A Khitan statesman during the Mongol Empire. He advised Ögedei Khan to implement Han Chinese administrative methods in North China and protect agricultural production, significantly influencing the Mongol Empire's governance policies.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗的第三子，蒙古帝国的第二位大汗。他在位期间灭金朝，并采纳耶律楚材的建议在汉地实行汉法。
description.en: The third son of Genghis Khan and the second Great Khan of the Mongol Empire. During his reign, the Jin dynasty was conquered, and he adopted Yelü Chucai's advice to implement Han Chinese administrative methods.

description.zh-cn: 元朝将领，在厓山海战中率领元军击败宋军，导致南宋灭亡。
description.en: A general of the Yuan dynasty who led the Yuan forces to victory against the Song army in the Battle of Yamen, leading to the fall of the Southern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 南宋末年大臣，在厓山海战战败后，背着年幼的宋帝赵昺投海殉国。
description.en: A minister in the late Southern Song dynasty. After the defeat at the Battle of Yamen, he committed suicide by jumping into the sea with the young emperor Zhao Bing.

description.zh-cn: 南宋最后一位皇帝，在厓山海战后由陆秀夫背负投海身亡。
description.en: The last emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, who died after the Battle of Yamen when carried into the sea by Lu Xiufu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝开国将领，于1388年在捕鱼儿海击溃北元主力，导致北元国势大衰。
description.en: A founding general of the Ming dynasty who defeated the main force of the Northern Yuan at the Battle of Buir Lake in 1388, causing a severe decline in the Northern Yuan's power.

description.zh-cn: 北元皇帝，元天元帝。1388年被阿里不哥后裔也速迭尔杀害，北元亡。
description.en: An emperor of the Northern Yuan, also known as Uskhal Khan. He was killed in 1388 by Yesüder, a descendant of Ariq Böke, leading to the fall of the Northern Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥的后裔，于1388年杀害北元皇帝脱古思帖木儿，篡夺汗位，废除大元国号。
description.en: A descendant of Ariq Böke who assassinated the Northern Yuan emperor Tögüs Temür in 1388, usurped the throne, and abolished the 'Great Yuan' state title.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈公布《建国号诏》，建立国号为“大元”的元朝。
description.en: Kublai Khan issued the 'Edict on the Establishment of the State Title', founding the Yuan dynasty with the state title 'Great Yuan'.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗统一漠北诸部族后，建立了大蒙古国（蒙古帝国）。
description.en: After unifying the tribes of the northern steppes, Genghis Khan established the Great Mongol State (Mongol Empire).

description.zh-cn: 建议忽必烈采纳《易经》中“乾元”之意，将国号定为“大元”。
description.en: Advised Kublai Khan to adopt the meaning of 'Qianyuan' from the I Ching and establish the state title as 'Great Yuan'.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈颁布《建国号诏》，正式建立元朝。
description.en: Kublai Khan promulgated the 'Edict on the Establishment of the State Title' to officially found the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元军在厓山海战中击败宋军，丞相陆秀夫背负宋帝赵昺跳海殉国，南宋灭亡。
description.en: The Yuan army defeated the Song army in the Battle of Yamen. Chancellor Lu Xiufu committed suicide by jumping into the sea with Emperor Zhao Bing, leading to the demise of the Southern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元朝发动对南宋的战争，最终于1279年将其完全征服，统一中国。
description.en: The Yuan dynasty launched a war against the Southern Song, ultimately conquering it completely in 1279 and unifying China.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋建立的明朝发动北伐，攻陷元大都，结束了元朝在全国的统治。
description.en: The Ming dynasty, founded by Zhu Yuanzhang, launched a northern expedition and captured the Yuan capital Dadu, ending Yuan rule over China.

description.zh-cn: 率领明朝军队攻陷元大都，导致元廷退居漠北。
description.en: Led the Ming army to capture the Yuan capital Dadu, causing the Yuan court to retreat to the northern steppes.

description.zh-cn: 元朝在中原的统治结束后，其残余势力退居漠北，形成北元政权。
description.en: After the end of Yuan rule in the Central Plains, its remnants retreated to the northern steppes, forming the Northern Yuan regime.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈与阿里不哥为争夺汗位而爆发的战争，最终导致了蒙古帝国的分裂。
description.en: The war between Kublai and Ariq Böke for the khanate ultimately led to the fragmentation of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 在拖雷家族内战中争夺蒙古大汗之位。
description.en: Competed for the title of Great Khan of the Mongols during the Toluid Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 作为元末大规模的农民起义，红巾军起事严重动摇并最终推翻了元朝的统治。
description.en: As a large-scale peasant rebellion in the late Yuan, the Red Turban Rebellion severely weakened and ultimately overthrew the rule of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋在元末民变中崛起，最终建立明朝。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang rose to prominence during the rebellions of the late Yuan dynasty and eventually founded the Ming dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 1234年，蒙古帝国联合南宋攻灭金朝。
description.en: In 1234, the Mongol Empire, allied with the Southern Song, conquered the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 1227年，成吉思汗率军攻灭西夏。
description.en: In 1227, Genghis Khan led his army to conquer the Western Xia.

description.zh-cn: 劝谏窝阔台汗同意复苏农业，鼓励汉人垦殖以期长治久安，对蒙古帝国的统治政策产生重要影响。
description.en: Advised Ögedei Khan to revive agriculture and encourage Han people to cultivate land for long-term stability, significantly influencing the Mongol Empire's governance policies.

description.zh-cn: 在厓山海战中率领元军击败南宋军队，导致南宋灭亡。
description.en: Led the Yuan forces to defeat the Southern Song army in the Battle of Yamen, resulting in the fall of the Southern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在厓山海战战败后，为免被俘受辱，背着年幼的宋帝赵昺投海自尽，导致其死亡。
description.en: After the defeat at the Battle of Yamen, to avoid capture and humiliation, he committed suicide by jumping into the sea with the young Emperor Zhao Bing, causing his death.

description.zh-cn: 在捕鱼儿海战役中率领明军击溃北元主力，使其国势大衰。
description.en: Led the Ming army to defeat the main force of the Northern Yuan at the Battle of Buir Lake, severely weakening its power.

description.zh-cn: 杀害北元皇帝脱古思帖木儿，篡夺汗位，并废除大元国号，导致北元灭亡。
description.en: Assassinated the Northern Yuan emperor Tögüs Temür, usurped the throne, abolished the 'Great Yuan' state title, leading to the fall of the Northern Yuan.
